full_description:
Boeing is seeking an Entry-Level Software Engineer to work in their Seal Beach, CA location.

Position Responsibilities :
Address all phases of the software development lifecycle including:
Requirements and interface definition, design, development, and integration of embedded software for space-based applications
Formal qualification testing, including software test description generation and test script generation using TCL
Product maintenance
Ability to effectively communicate with internal customers during development and after product release.
Responsible for several parallel tasks as part of a fast-paced and dynamic team of systems and software engineers.

Required Qualifications, Experience and Education:
Typical Education/Experience:
Education/experience typically acquired through advanced technical education from an accredited course of study in engineering, computer science, mathematics, physics or chemistry (e.g. Bachelor) or an equivalent combination of technical education and experience. In the USA, ABET accreditation is the preferred, although not required, accreditation standard.

Basic Qualifications (Required Skills/Experience):
This position requires the ability to obtain a final U.S. Top Secret Security Clearance based on a Single Scope Background Investigation (SSBI) post-start, for which the federal government requires US citizenship.
Must have previous experience developing software using C.
Must possess a Bachelor’s degree or higher by end of 2021.

Preferred Qualifications (Desired Skills/Experience):
Current/Active SSBI or SCI
Previous technical experience in an aerospace environment.
Self-motivated problem solver, capable of taking initiative with minimal instruction.
Works under general supervision.
Able to problem solve in a clear and concise manner.
Possesses strong communication skills.
Experience with Unix/Linux.

Relocation:
This position offers relocation based on candidate eligibility. Basic relocation is available for internal candidates.

Drug Free Workplace:
Boeing is a Drug Free Workplace where post offer applicants and employees are subject to testing for marijuana, cocaine, opioids, amphetamines, PCP, and alcohol when criteria is met as outlined in our policies.
